sentences: A computer is a device that can be <<||>> to carry out an arbitrary set of arithmetic or logical <<||>> automatically. Their ability of computers to follow a <<||>> of operations, called a program, make computers very <<||>> and useful. Such computers are used as control systems for a very wide <<||>> of industrial and consumer devices. This includes simple special purpose devices like microwave ovens and remote controls, factory devices such as <<||>> and computer assisted design, but also in general purpose devices like personal computers and <<||>> such as smartphones. The Internet is <<||>> on computers and it connects millions of other computers. Since <<||>>, simple manual devices like the abacus aided people in doing calculations. Early in the <<||>> Revolution, some mechanical devices were built to automate long <<||>> tasks, such as guiding patterns for looms. More <<||>> electrical machines did specialized <<||>> calculations in the early 20th century. The first <<||>> electronic calculating machines were developed during World War II.  The speed and versatility of computers increased <<||>> and dramatically since then, to the point that <<||>> may become possible in the future. Via wikipedia.org
